title: Did Sarah Palin say that people with Lyme disease should stop eating lemons?
subtitle: The proposed changes to the health-care laws have revived the old Mimi, which is a false quote from Lyme to Sarah Palin.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Sarah Palin said that Obamacker made people irresponsible and that people with Lyme's disease should stop eating lemons.
